Algorithm.name: DynamicAggregatesAlg
Algorithm.Comment:
This algorithm is for aggregations across HDB expected intervals. Will do any ORACLE based aggregation that takes only the one value as the function ie MAX(value) so this algorithm can presently do:
min, max, avg, count, sum, median, stddev, and variance
specify the aggregate they desire by stating the oracle function in the aggregate_name property ie aggregate_name=sum
MIN_VALUES_REQUIRED: setting to zero means use max number observations for interval
